attributes.action: Ask if he will be sending his best wishes to all English/Christians who reside in England and who will be celebrating their patron saints day of St George's Day on April 23rd?  He sent his best wishes to all Muslim people who reside in England/Britain on the occassion of Eid. As we live in a multicutural/religious society in Britain, we English who have a distinct and proud identity of our own as do the Scottish, Welsh and N.Irish people, would also appreciate a few words of support for our saints day which is very important to us and to our children. Just as Eid is equally important to Muslim people.
